# This file was generated by FRUT's Jucer2CMake from "vocode.jucer"

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("vocode")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


set(vocode_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/vocode.jucer"
)


set(JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH "/home/jimkang/apps/JUCE/modules")


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_FORMAT_VERSION "1"
  PROJECT_FILE "${vocode_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "s2L6uB"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "vocode"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  USE_GLOBAL_APPCONFIG_HEADER OFF
  ADD_USING_NAMESPACE_JUCE_TO_JUCE_HEADER OFF
  REPORT_JUCE_APP_USAGE ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN ON # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license
  PROJECT_TYPE "Console Application"
  BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER "com.yourcompany.vocode"
  CXX_LANGUAGE_STANDARD "C++14"
)

jucer_project_files("vocode/Source"
# Compile   Xcode     Binary    File
#           Resource  Resource
  x         .         .         "Source/Main.cpp"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_audio_basics
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_audio_formats
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
  # JUCE_USE_FLAC
  # JUCE_USE_OGGVORBIS
  # JUCE_USE_MP3AUDIOFORMAT
  # JUCE_USE_LAME_AUDIO_FORMAT
  # JUCE_USE_WINDOWS_MEDIA_FORMAT
)

  juce_core
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"

  # JUCE_ENABLE_ALLOCATION_HOOKS
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_data_structures
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
)

jucer_project_module(
  juce_dsp
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"

jucer_project_module(

  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
  # JUCE_EXECUTE_APP_SUSPEND_ON_BACKGROUND_TASK
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "vocode"
)

  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF

)
